page.title: 10Hexton School Building
page.content: The{school building}is made of brick covered with{pebble dash.}There are {two large classrooms}with a dining room between. Behind this is a painting room, a small classroom next door and an Office where the Secretary and Headteacher work. The Junior classroom is rectangular. There are 16 double desks for children and one for the teacher. Cupboards, shelves, a piano, television and a computer occupy the rest of the room. 31 children work here. 22 children work in the infant room sitting at desks or tables. The kitchen adjoins this room. Everyone eats dinner at school. 3 children bring their own food. Every_ one else eats dinners cooked in the school kitchen by our{superb cook!}Our favourite meal is Shepherd's Pie with raw carrots, and Volcano Pudding that is like a mountain with jam all over.
